nodes.bodyText: Should be fixed in com.ibm.ws.jaxws.clientcontainer, com.ibm.ws.jaxrs.2.0.common and com.ibm.ws.org.apache.cxf.cxf.rt.frontend.jaxrs.3.2 components as well?
Yes, good catch.

eeCompatible-9.0 should stay in this feature.  We want it on the public feature so that the error messaging shows which feature that was enabled by the user to create a conflict.  The client feature is not a public feature so it doesn't need the eeCompatible.  The public feature that brings in the private client feature will have it enabled.
